message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. How about $16,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $16,000 is still a bit below my minimum. How about we split the difference and settle on $17,000? It's a fair price considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose $16,500 as a compromise. This still keeps me within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
